title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma…) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node + browsers).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models in a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model (Docker one-liner).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and streaming support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that proxies to Ollama, useful for quick internal demos.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that packages Ollama and common models for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cdktf
summary: CDK-TF (Terraform) construct library to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with GPU.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an „Ollama“ command to summarize notes or generate text locally.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain in a single docker-compose.

title: ollama-node
summary: npm package (official JS client) for chatting, embedding, and pulling models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama
summary: PyPI package (official Python client) providing sync & async APIs to Ollama’s endpoints.

title: r/ollama – Local LLaMA models with Ollama
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tips, new integrations, and troubleshooting Ollama setups.
